name: AnimalSpeak
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal speak
des: Animal Speak is an interactive app for learning all of the different sounds that animals make. Alexa will prompt you to say an animal and then you will hear the sounds that the animal makes. Alexa will continue to ask until the user cancels the skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
